title: Lemongrass Hope
description: A time-bending and unconventional love story about the choices we make and the love that finds us anyway."Lemongrass Hope is that fine and fresh thing - a truly new story ... Amy Impellizzeri is a bold and tender writer, who makes the impossible feel not only real, but strangely familiar." -Jacquelyn Mitchard, New York Times #1 Best-selling Author, ‘The Deep End of the Ocean'“A layered, bittersweet romance that questions consequences and explores second chances.”-Kirkus Reviews“What a GREAT story … [Amy Impellizzeri] really honed in on a primal longing in this modern-day world that I think is deep within many of us.”-Amanda Mininger, Author, Touch“Amy Impellizzeri has crafted a heartbreaking story of choices. Compelling, thought-provoking, and filled with enchantment, Lemongrass Hope takes you through magical waters, and leaves you wondering about your own second chances.”-Karen Brown, Author, The Longings of Wayward Girls“Wow. You have to read this book.”-The Book Club Blog
author: Amy Impellizzeri
